name: sternal fracture
description: A sternal fracture is characterized by a break or crack in the breastbone, typically resulting from direct trauma to the chest. Adiological imaging such as X-rays or CT scans is utilized to visualize and assess the extent of the sternal injury, aiding in diagnosis and determining appropriate management strategies.
